          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Burning of magnesium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennen des Magnesiums</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Brûlure du magnésium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Queimadura do magnésio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bruciandosi del magnesio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάψιμο του μαγνήσιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El quemarse del magnesio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that magnesium, as a reactive metal, burns in air by reacting with oxygen to form magnesium oxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal oxides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Oxidation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reactive metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Magnesium, wie 
reagierendes Metall, in einer Luft brennt, indem es mit Sauerstoff zum
Formularmagnesiumoxid reagiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le magnésium, comme
métal réactif, brûle en air par la réaction avec l'oxygène à 
l'oxyde de magnésium de forme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o magnésio, como um
metal reactive, se queima no ar reagindo com o oxigênio ao óxido do 
magnésio do formulário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il magnesio, come
metallo reattivo, si brucia in aria reagendo con l'ossigeno all'ossido
del magnesio della forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το μαγνήσιο, ως 
αντιδραστικό μέταλλο, καίει στον αέρα με την αντίδραση με το 
οξυγόνο στο οξείδιο μαγνήσιου μορφής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el magnesio, como 
metal reactivo, se quema en aire reaccionando con oxígeno al óxido 
del magnesio de la forma.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
